name: Q (itch)
description:
Q is a fun block buster game with quick changing scenic, the abstract world of geometries along with Leap Motion controller, it will be an artsy 1+ minute fun experience.

Move your hand around to shoot.

Hold 'Fist' to charge.

If you like this game and love to see more of it, do drop us an email or message. You can find us at

www.facebook.com/commonextract

and

www.commonextract.com
